Title: Rules and Consequences
Description:
I fear I have grown too brazen in my offerings of succor as of late. I seem to have attracted some untoward eyes.

Be on guard. A veiled threat looms.
RewardText:
Thank you for your aid. I am a great mind, but my acuity for combat is less impressive.

Still, if Ansurek's assassins have found me...

No. I cannot stop now. I have too much yet to do.
